verses.roman:
darśana kari' mahāprabhu calilā bāhire
bhaṭṭācārya ānila tāṅre kāśī-miśra-ghare

synonyms: darśana kari'-seeing Lord Jagannātha; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; calilā—departed; bāhire—outside; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; ānila—brought; tāṅre—Him; kāśī-miśra-ghare—to the house of Kāśī Miśra.
translation: After seeing Lord Jagannātha, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu left the temple. The Bhaṭṭācārya then took Him to the house of Kāśī Miśra.
